item.title: Fly tipping and filth all over Ceres Road, 6th November
item.description:
The street hasn't been cleaned in months. The rubbish problem gets worse daily. There is trash and filth all over the streets around here. My reports keep getting marked as fixed although no-one has come. Please can we get these roads cleaned they are vile and hazardous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ceres Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On the corner of Brondesbury Villas and Mallard Close, 6th November
item.description:
Someone has dumped a bin of sorts which has some construction waste in it. It's not being used as a rubbish which is quite handy to be fair but it's starting to overflow.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn High Road, London

item.title: Flytipping, 6th November
item.description:
A washing machine and mattress was flytipped outside Number 39, this has been previously reported with no collection, resident did move this into the ally whilst she was waiting for it to be collected as it was an eyesore but was then advised this is not our land, but she though she was doing the right thing in moving it off the footway. the items are outside 39 and need removal asap because this is where the items were originally left.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Darenth Road, East Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime bike users dump their rubbish here, including bottles of urine, 6th November
item.description:
Lime bike users empty the Lime bike baskets and dump the rubbish, including bottles of urine on the street and pavement. Also the pavement is often blocked now - ie almost every day, by Voi bikes left on the pavement.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Albion Drive, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Just inside the gates to branch hill house, 6th November
item.description:
The street light is broken. A woman was assaulted here yesterday and there's no light which makes it feel very unsafe. There are also large potholes in the street which makes it dangerous to walk in the dark.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Spedan Close, West Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars parking in restricted area close to junction, 6th November
item.description:
This is a restricted zone Mon - Sat 9am-6pm and cars are constantly parking here. The block driveways and cause obstruction to the junction Kangley Bridge Road/Stanton Way. It is dangerous and the council does not properly enforce these restrictions.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kangley Bridge Road, Perry Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Main building door always broken, 6th November
item.description:
For roughly a year or so. The main buildings door is constantly being broken by non residents to gain access to the other side or the estate or using the building for use of drugs. Itâ€™s being fixed & broken again several times. The issue is ongoing.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Springfield, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
